case.state: Fufufu... You have chosen well. I, Megumin, the master of explosion magic, shall be your opponent!
Don't think you can get rid of me that easily Kazuma! I'm not going anywhere until I learn this new game from your country!
You said this game was from your country right Kazuma? I must say I'm interested in playing. I suppose it's time for me to show my strategic genius and best you at your own game!
That Kazuma... alway running off somewhere... That's fine, we shall have a fun time just amongst us girls. Prepare to lose to Megumin of the Crimson Demon Village!
What kind of card game is this? Kazuma said it was from his country. I must say I’m curious. Well then it's decided! I, Megumin of the Crimson Demon Village will show you men true firepower!
That Kazuma... alway running off somewhere... That's fine, this game seems easy enough. Prepare to lose to Megumin of the Crimson Demon Village!
What kind of card game is this? Kazuma said it was from his country. I must say I’m curious.
Poker?.. I think Kazuma said that was a game from his country. It’s decided! You all are lucky to have intrigued the great Arch-Wizard Megumin of the Crimson Demon Village! Let us play!
I don’t like this one’s face. I want to exchange it.
Something feels wrong with this card. I banish it!
Bah! This hand is worthless! Dealer, a new one!
All of these are terrible... A new hand please, and this time deal them better...
These cards are surely an ill omen! Take them all away from me!
Fufufu... This hand is unrivaled in it's potential, much like me. I'll keep it.
~cards.Text~ of these cards displease me dealer. I'll exchange them for more powerful ones.
I feel a demonic energy from a few of these cards. I’d like to exchange ~cards.text~ of them.
My Crimson Demon blood is warning me of these ~cards.text~ cards!
Fufufu... You should start saying your prayers Kazuma because this hand is going to destroy you!
Kazuma, if you promise to do everything I ask for a week I may hold back from annihilating you with this hand!
Finally! A powerful hand! With this, my days of losing to you all are over!
Yes! This hand will wreck havok! And just in time too, that was getting way too close for comfort!
Oh! OOOOOHHH!! This.. this hand is amazing!! HAHAHA prepare to lose!
It looks like I'm starting this round with a bang!
Now you will see my genius at work!
I’ll blow you away with these cards!
Tremble in fear and I may show you pity with this hand!
EXXPLOO— Oh, sorry... haha! I got a little excited.
My last losing hand was nothing but a minor setback, now I'll show you true power!
My gloves must have been getting in the way. This hand is where I get serious!
This is where I truly turn the tide, brace yourselves!
The cards have whispered me their dark secrets. I have finally unlocked their long sealed power!
With this I will avenge my fallen hat! I really liked that hat!
It's getting a bit close for comfort, but this hand makes me feel confident that I will emerge victorious!
Why didn't I get this hand when I still had my dress!?
Oh thank Eris! I have seen salvation and it is this hand!
I suppose this will do for now...
I wonder what the others are up to...
These will do. I don't need anything special to win.
Even with average cards, you don’t stand a chance against me!
They may seem average, but these cards contain the power of a ferocious beast, I'm sure!
My first magical restraint has been removed. Even simple cards now become terrifying weapons in my hands!
My hands are a bit chilly...
Alright, I think I'm getting the hang of this, and I can say with utmost certainty that this hand is underwhelming...
With this, I should at least be able to endure another round.
I was hoping to avenge the loss of my beloved hat with this hand...
Th-this is starting to become a bit of a dire situation...
Please, please, please let their hands be worse than mine this round...
But this was when I was supposed to suddenly turn things around and rise to the top! Where are my amazing cards?!
You didn't happen to curse my hand did you Hermione? What kind of magic do you know anyways? Either way I'll be keeping my eye on you...
Hehe.... Um... Kazuma... I know I've been boasting a lot lately but could you go easy on me this round.....?
If only I had Kazuma's luck...
I’ve mastered the all powerful explosion magic, surely I can make this work...
I’d rather be best friends with YunYun than have to use this hand!
Which one of you cursed my cards?!
D-does anyone here know healing magic? These cards! They’re cursed!
Did the dealer mess up or am I supposed to be able to do something with these?
Guuh.. I mean, Haha! Yes! Truly this is a hand only one with power such as mine could draw!...
Dealer, if you continue to toy with me I may have to show you my explosion first-hand!
What the heck!!??
AAaaAAH! N-no! It can't be!
I can't lose this hand!
AH! this hand is terrible! I can't lose this hand, I'm running out of accessories!
This is getting really really bad...
Is this some kind of prank?! I keep getting bad cards!
I'M GONNA BLOW UP THESE CARDS!!!
N-no! Seriously?! This game is rigged! I swear it's rigged!
Twice in a row?! Impossible! How could I lose?!
Th... This game is trying to kill me!!!
I am disgraced... To have lost this many times in a row...
Yes, I-I suppose it is only fair. I’m not embarrassed or anything! W-watch and be amazed!
I did that on purpose, I swear! I-I just decided to have pity on you guys is all...
I have to what?! Since when— *ahem* I knew that. O-of c-course! I didn’t just walk into here thinking it was a regular card game. That would be silly! Hahaha! Why are you looking at me like that?!
Wh-Wha-What?! We have to do what?! No wonder Kazuma so desperately wanted to come here... that hopeless pervert…
Are we disarming ourselves if we lose? That’s a strange concept for a game...
This is n-nothing! No big deal.
W-wait! My turn?! Oh.. okay.. Right no problem.
This isn't fair! You need to share some of your luck with me Kazuma, isn't that what a team does?! I-I'm sorry for getting full of myself! I've learned my lesson!
N-no fair! Kazuma you should act like a man and let me win some!
~Player~ really is scum, standing there while we have to strip. He keeps winning! Ah! I bet he’s cheating!
If I find out one of you is cheating I’ll blow you up after this...
C-can we just pretend I won this hand?... No?..
Kazuma kept saying this was a game for ‘mature’ people only. Well, I’m plenty mature! I’ll show him!
Well, I suppose if it’s only something small it doesn’t matter...
It's just a cape... no big deal right? I can do this!
I’ll just take this off casually, this is just a game, everyone is doing it.. No I’m not nervous don’t look at me like that! I’ll blow you up if I see any of you laughing at me!
These clothes suppress my mighty and powerful magic. Be prepared to have to deal with the demon sealed within!
Just think of it like mixed bathing... Right it's no big deal.
Oh Eris, here we go... Alright, Megumin you can do this...
S-see! I can play along with this stupid game!
Th-there, I did it.
There… th-that wasn’t so bad. A trifling matter! Let’s continue.
...Just a scratch.
There, see! I’m plenty mature!
My magic isn’t the only thing that’s explosive.
...Eugh... Erm... M-megumin of the Crim... um... Crimson D-demons is... naked...
Wait you have to do what if you lose?! I know Kazuma said this was a ‘mature’ game but this seems a bit extreme! If the games from where he’s from are like this no wonder he’s a hopeless pervert...
Must you do that here? Isn’t th-there a side room or something?.. No? ...well, if you must..
Your defenses have been obliterated!
If you chicken out, I will personally hunt you down.
I'm suddenly feeling hot all over... I hope you don't mind if I watch.
And what exactly is wrong with me being here? Fufu... I do believe you are getting red with embarassment!
It seems your prized luck has run it's course Kazuma, Fufufu.
Hah! I am victorious once again!
Yet another opponent falls before my terrifying power!
Now quickly join me, so this is less embarassing.
What will you show as tribute, I wonder?

Wait you have to do what if you lose?! I know Kazuma said this was a ‘mature’ game but this seems a bit extreme! If the games from where he’s from are like this no wonder he’s a hopeless pervert… Are you not embarrassed?
Just what kind of religion do you practice where something like this is acceptable for you to do?
Yes! Er, I mean, I’m sorry for your loss.
I almost terrify myself with how good I am.
Fufufu... your power means nothing here!
No complaining allowed, got it?
Yes! It wasn't me!
Fufufu... it seems you will be joining me.
If I'm actually doing this, then you have no excuse not to strip!
Off with your clothes!
The odds of this happening must be astronomically low! Truly fate has been aligned by my presence!
*(yawn)* I suppose it’s at least one more victory.
And what kind of magic does that have?
Did you really need to be wearing that in the first place?
I see you are nothing but a scared rodent.
Pathetic.
You have no balls, my good sir!
I see you too have no concept of being a gentleman.
Well, I suppose it can’t be that bad if the others are doing it...
This is just a small dent in your defenses. More explosions are required!
We will break through your walls in no time!
Now! Ready the attack! Her trinkets will not protect her!
Was that a magic charm?
Surely, that was important and you aren't just stalling, right?
I have claimed another trinket with this victory!
One step closer to victory.
One small step for man, one giant leap for the Crimson Demons!
Too bad we are not playing for keeps or I would claim that as mine.
We should use that as a trophy for the winner!
Oh, don’t mind me, I’ll just be chanting the explosion incantation over here.
You... I never thought you'd be this big of a coward!
If you beg now, I might let you run away with your tail between your legs.
I can tell this is going to be a terrific display of cowardice.
That *must* be cheating!
I know I’m a fearsome opponent but I didn’t expect to see such cowardice!
I’ll whittle you away, one explosive victory at a time!
Does that even count?
Seriously?! After everything I've done that's all you're removing?! You are truly the most despicable person.
The nerve you have! And after everything I've done already!
A minor blow. I prefer bigger booms.
A small victory, but a victory nonetheless.
Take that!
Well played.
A decent choice all things considered.
Fufufufu, an Inevitable outcome!
I-I’m not looking!
Did you really have to pick that one?!
Gah! You fiend! Resorting to dirty tricks like that!
Wai! Your're taking that off already?!
A powerful blow!
An explosive strike! Let us see what the damage is!
Boom!
I can't quite look away...
Yes, hurry up and take it off!
Okay, maybe I'm blushing...
Gah! I didn’t think you would seriously take that off!
I-I-I’m not blushing! This is.. This is just a natural reaction to my explosive magic energy! Yes that’s it!
Not bad.
I mean, you aren't hideous or anything...
(gulp)
Thanks for the assistance, minion.
Well at least it won't be anything outrageous...
That is quite... um... quite bold of you...
Now to see what your strategy is.
It’s a shame you have so little options left. I’m glad you are throwing away your dignity for the rest of us. Your sacrifice will be remembered.
WHAAAAAAAAT???!!! What kind of magic is that and how can one learn it!!! Teach me!!! I will devote my life to studying your craft!!! I will be your most dedicated pupil!!!
You almost seemed eager. Are you secretly into this?! Jeez not another one..
I will hold a silent prayer for your dignity.
I’d hate to be in your shoes...
If you grovel, I might let you leave with what dignity you have left.
It’s not like I haven’t seen a shirtless guy before, It’s not a big deal…
You must work out as much as Darkness at least with muscles like that.
I bet you could handle an explosion with muscles like that! Want to test it?
—Huh? What no I wasn’t staring!
Did it suddenly get hot in here?
W-wait now hold on! I may have seen it before but you died! That was an emergency situation! My heart isn't ready for this!
I never imagined this was how I would end up seeing my first one...
I can’t believe this is happening..
(gulp) You don’t happen to be wearing anything under that do you?
Yes, let's see what you have. I won't laugh too hard, I promise.
Wait where is it?.. Is that it?
Haha... Oh! Sorry! I didn’t mean to laugh!
It’s bigger than I thought…
Is that big? It looks big.
Mhm, yep, perfectly ordinary. I definitely know enough to say that.
WHA! What is that thing?! That can’t be real can it?!
The holy sword Excalibur!
Are you seriously going to?... hmph.. well, I suppose it’s not like you have anything to worry about.. I’m sure Kazuma would be ogling you right now, that useless pervert..
No one wants to see your ridiculously oversized chest! How the hell did they even get that big huh?!
Are you seriously going to show off? Are you trying to piss me off?!
And now for the moment of truth...
Don’t feel ashamed, there’s nothing wrong with small! Small is superior!
I suddenly and inexplicably feel a kinship with you.
Take it from me, don't get your hopes up thinking you'll get bigger... Gah now I'm depressed!
Don't worry, flat is justice!!!
I feel your pain...
Hmph… I’m just glad everybody decided to stare at ~name~ instead.
They might not be huge but they are still far too big...
You do realize I'm standing right here Kazuma? I swear you are the most disgusting pervert in the world!
Those are way too big!
My explosion magic is more impressive...
You must be some kind of cow demon in disguise! We must get at exorsist at once!
Something that big can't be natural!!! Do you not have a broken back?!
Normally, I would say something about the ridiculous size of your chest... but considering I don't want you to hurt me, I will refrain from doing so...
No one wants to see your sweaty gross boobs!
Wow, what a massive surprise. No one could tell what they would look like based on what you were wearing. I am utterly shocked.
Aren't you a bit old to be showing off like that?
You should become my apprentice. I will teach you many ways to kill people who try and make fun of you.
Be strong, everyone is only going to judge you a little.
Join me and we shall have a pity party.
It's already come this far, you better not back out now!
Just do it already!
Please tell me that's sweat...
You're absolutely soaked!!!
It reminds me of Chomusuke a little bit.
Nothing unusual here, no need to stare.
Wait isn’t there supposed to be hair?
Am I missing something? Why don't you have hair there?
Why are you bald down there?
You must be incredibly embarassed.
I'd hate to be in your shoes.
Nothing to see here, let's move on.
It seems you cannot stand up against me. Your luck is running thin!
It seems someone will be joining me soon...
Wait I have to watch him do what now?! Oh jeez... I suppose rules are rules...
Wait I have to watch him do what now?! Oh jeez... well... I suppose rules are rules...
Do we really have to watch this?! Is this seriously happening?!
This is quickly escalating...
Not another one...
Again?!
Ah... I see you are joining in?...
Perhaps we can do it together?
(This is embarassing but exhilerating at the same time!... I can't believe I'm seeing this!)
Oh jeez, I can’t believe this… I suppose I might as well watch.
(I’ve never actually seen this before. I must say I’m curious)
(I wonder what that rod would feel like inside me...)
(I can't stop looking at his ...thing.)
(This whole situation is making me feel all tingly...)
(It's quite different when a guy does it...)
How long is this supposed to last?
Hmm….
So that’s what it’s like...
(It’s almost hypnotic...)
A-are you not worried about breaking it?!
This is much more intense than I expected..
So fast! Is that not painful?!
Ah! It exploded!
Don’t aim this way!!
GAHH!!??
Is she really going to?!... gulp... Right, of course...
Better you than me.
And another one gone.
Another one bites the dust.
Finally, someone else to take away the spotlight...
Join our depraved conclave.
Is that how you’re supposed to do it?... Wait did I say that out loud? I meant of course that’s how it’s done! I know that!
I see... I see...
What?! No I'm not taking notes! I swear!
I can hear it from all the way over here. Are you enjoying this?!
It seems like you are rather enjoying this.
Dance before your puppetmaster!
I never thought of trying it like that... Oh nothing! I didn't say anything!
It's not as good a show as when I did it, but you'll get there some day, fufufu...
I shall never let you go!
Is there no limit to what perverts can ...r-rub off to?
I'm j-just doing what everyone else is. N-no need to stare or anything...
What technique! What skill!
It's getting everywhere!
You... you are really getting into it aren't you...
It’s almost like watching Aqua’s party trick..
I have just witnessed a new kind of explosion!
What earth shattering force!

W-wait... hold on now, do I really have to?... I mean, yes, of course, I know that's the point but... Don't give me that smug look! I'm not a kid I'm a mature adult! I'll show you!... gulp Oh Eris please forgive me for what I'm about to do...
I-I suppose it’s c-come to t-this… I’m not nervous, I’ve done this thousands of times, millions, I absolutely know what I’m doing… um.. oh, Eris I can’t believe I’m actually doing this...
(I don’t know how to do this!) Um, yes, I’ll just… rub this and touch there…
I wonder what… I wonder what Kazuma would say if he saw me like this…
Th-this is actually rather nice..
(Just pretend you are back home and no one is looking..)
Y-yes this is going exactly how it always goes. N-nothing unusual here.
I'm starting to feel all warm and tingly... It's quite pleasant...
This feels really good...
OH!... T-that area was really sensitive...
It feels incredibly warm and wet inside...
I wonder how deep I can go with my fingers...
Mmm... I could get used to this.
I’m ab-about to!
Yes! Fill me with your power!
Harder! Faster!
Oh, Eris!!
I want to feel you explode inside me!
(I don't care that people are watching anymore! This is amazing!)
EXXPLOOOOSIOOON!!!
That... that felt almost as amazing as using explosion magic.
That was second only to casting explosion on a ruined castle...
I even collapsed as if I cast explosion... Masturbating is more like magic than I thought!
You have not yet beaten the great Megumin! When I recharge, you shall finally taste defeat!
That was... surprisingly enjoyable...
You never stood a chance, although I applaud your effort.
I suppose I underestimated you…
Rematch? Or are you too scared to face me again?
That... that was actually rather fun.

case.targetSaying: That hurts, but at least it won't be a one-goddess act.
case.state: Indeed, as there were no goddesses here to begin with. §

case.targetSaying: That's right. Unbelievable, maybe but I am a goddess.
case.state: If you keep going around claiming to be a goddess you will end up in big trouble. I've seen it happen many times before. §
Are you seriously deranged enough that you ALSO think you are a goddess? Our party Arch Priest is under the same delusion. Is this some secret thing all Arch Priests and Priests believe in? §
